remarks: The order of a product is the product of the orders, if the factors have coprime order.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Oct-2015.)
statement:
odadd1.1 $e |- O = ( od ` G ) $.
odadd1.2 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
odadd1.3 $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
odadd $p |- ( ( ( G e. Abel /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) /\ ( ( O ` A ) gcd ( O ` B ) ) = 1 ) -> ( O ` ( A .+ B ) ) = ( ( O ` A ) x. ( O ` B ) ) ) $.
